channel.title: [Delta] Spinning Wheel And Flax?

item.title: [Delta] Spinning Wheel And Flax?
item.dc:creator: @Notoriouscape Notoriouscape
item.description:
@Notoriouscape wrote:

I use blu3scape/delta source and it had flax at skills and i moved skills to a different spot and the flax and spinning wheel wont work anymore?

plus in client.java i found

long now = System.currentTimeMillis(); boolean oFound = false; TurnPlayerTo(objectX, objectY); if ((objectID == 2646) && ((absX >= ####) && (absX <= ####)) & ((absY >= ####) && (absY <= ####))) { if (now - lastAction >= 900) { addItem(1779, 1); lastAction = now; }

so i changed the absX to where i wanted the flax start and finish etc and it still doesnt work?

please?

Read full topic
